name: Ghost Steps
description:
Welcome to the turn-based game; Ghost Steps!

Read the tutorial in game to see how to play!

This game was made in a few evenings for Week 147 of the Weekly Game Jam. The theme was "Invisible".

There are 10 levels overall and all you need to play is a mouse.

Hope you enjoy!

Art: https://vurmux.itch.io/urizen-onebit-tilesets

Audio: Bought from gamedev market
